signature.description: Information about the included signature in the JAR file

content.description: Specifies the PKCS7 signature embedded within the JAR file

publicKey.description: The X509 certificate containing the public key JAR which verifies the signature of the JAR

content.description: Specifies the content of the X509 certificate containing the public key used to verify the signature

archive.description: Information about the archive associated with the entry

hash.description: Specifies the hash algorithm and value encompassing the entire signed archive

algorithm.description: The hashing function used to compute the hash value

value.description: The hash value for the archive

url.description: Specifies the location of the archive; if this is specified, a hash value must also be provided

content.description: Specifies the archive inline within the document

extraData.description: Arbitrary content to be included in the verifiable entry in the transparency log
